commands.name: new-from-clipboard
commands.title: New Bike From Clipboard
commands.description: Creates a new Bike document from the clipboard contents.

commands.name: append-from-clipboard
commands.title: Append to Bike From Clipboard
commands.description: Adds the clipboard contents to the end of the most recently active Bike document.

commands.name: new-from-template
commands.title: New Bike From Template
commands.description: Creates a new Bike document from a user-selected template.

commands.name: close-all-but-current
commands.title: Close Other Bikes
commands.description: Gracefully closes all except the current Bike document, prompting to save as needed.

commands.name: force-close-all-but-current
commands.title: Force Close Other Bikes
commands.description: Force closes all except the current Bike document.

commands.name: set-background-color
commands.title: Bike Background Color
commands.description: Sets the background color of Bike windows.

commands.name: set-foreground-color
commands.title: Bike Foreground Color
commands.description: Sets the foreground color of Bike windows.

commands.name: copy-url
commands.title: Copy Bike URL
commands.description: Copies the URL for the current Bike document to the clipboard.
